text: Leland "Lee" Corso (born August 7, 1935http://www.birthdatedatabase.com Lee R Corso 1935-08-07 Lake Mary, FL) is an American sports broadcaster and football analyst for ESPN and former long-time college football coach. He has been a featured analyst on ESPN's College GameDay program since its inception in 1987. Corso was born and raised in Lake Mary, Florida. ==References== ==Other websites== * ESPN bio * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American football players Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Lee Corso
